braindump.name: Braindump
braindump.description: Braindump is a mobile application that help people practice good mental hygiene. As life continue to become more complex, we believe will become a necessity. We aim to improve your brain function and prevent burnout in just a few minutes everyday. Neuroscience has shown that by using simple techniques people can change the structure and function of their brain. Braindump uses these techniques to help founders maintain their focus, while handling the demands of being a founder.

howItWorks.name: ONE THOUGHT, ONE ENTRY. SIMPLE AS THAT.
howItWorks.description: Every entry into Braindump represents a single thought, idea, decision, or piece of information you don't want to forget (but don't want to constantly remember either). In addition to the text, you can enhance the information contained in each entry by adding time triggers, amounts, social mentions, and more.

howItWorks.name: STAYING ORGANIZED HAS NEVER BEEN EASIER.
howItWorks.description: When you add an entry to your stream, it shows with your other entries from each day. By adding additional tags to your entries you can associate that entry with any number of other enrtries simply by sharing the same tag. Bigger projects, decisions, or areas of your life might have there own tags and hundreds of entries associated with them.

howItWorks.name: REVIEW, REORDER, AND REVISE.
howItWorks.description: Looking at your stream throughout your day gives you an instant snapshot of the things that you've done, and the things that you still have to do. You can reorder the entries to relect your priorities, and update with additional information.

howItWorks.name: YOU MIGHT EVEN HAVE A LITTLE FUN!
howItWorks.description: Braindump uses emoji as signifiers for your entries, pick your favorites! Use them and all the elements to create the system that works for you. Mental hygiene is important is important but that doesn't mean it can't be fun!

packhire.name: PackHire
packhire.description: PackHire provides you with platform where you can turn people in your network into the best recruiters for your company. Most best hires come from referrals from within a trusted network. PackHire was challenging because the tool have to be simple, intuitive and sticky, while maintaining optiminal functionality. My co-worker and I received small angel funding and were able to do it all and had a fully functional platform up in just two weeks.

PackHire: Social Media Integration (allowing users to easily share on all of their social media)
Statistical analysis of vital data points on how the job is doing in the network.
Individualized analytics tracking for employees to follow their progress and impact on the job campaign.
Algorithmic scoring of candidates based on network graph
Campaign management system for HR to edit their job listing campaign
Front-End: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Gulp, & JQuery

seam.name: SEAM
seam.description: Our team was fed up with the way meetings occupied our lives - meetings that we didn't have to be in, meetings that ran way over time and meetings that made no decisions. After meetings, we would crawl back to our desks feeling unproductive and frustrated. So we created SEAM, a tool to help you feel productive in the meeting room. SEAM helps you plan for focused discussions, gives you the power to move the conversation forward and aligns your team on next steps at the end of the meeting.

SEAM: Auto-Management of Contact List & Most Recently Added

data.name: Data Science
data.description: My data science projects include a bioinformatics research project and a social media advertising data project. For my bioinformatics research project I created a pipeline that sequenced genomic human data and iteratively corrected the data for bias and noise. After the correction, I visualized the 3D architecture of the entire genome to determine methods of cancer detection based on nuclear architecture. For my social media advertising project, I created algorithms that automatically queried Facebook for statistics on the social ads. After the data is collected, I created algorithms to optimize engagement and insights on social ads such as increasing ad duration during peak engagements. The data is then stored for further analysis and optimzation by the 4C Insights data science team.

PITCH(Genomic Architecture): Visual generation of heatmaps and circos plots
4C Insights Data Aggregation: Statistical correction & filter of advertisement data
Visual generation of data after correction

front.name: Front-End Projects
front.description: My front-end projects consists of creating multiple sites for clients as well as organizations to visualize data and content in a meaningful and optimized way. All of the projects I build are fully-responsive and provide detailed instructions on how to update content on the site. Many of my sites are still being used in production after 2 years with 20,000+ views.

My Front-End Projects: Task Automation for faster styling changes and updates
Segmented code for easier content edits
